name: url-shortener-data
title: URL Shortener Data Generator
description: Generate URL shortener redirect mappings from lists of URLs
content:
Overview

This application generates URL shortener redirect mappings from lists of URLs. It reads URLs from JSON or CSV files and creates short codes using hash-based generation, outputting the mappings in JSON, CSV, or both formats.

Features

  • Generate short codes from URLs using MD5 hashing
  • Support for JSON and CSV input formats
  • Output in JSON, CSV, or both formats
  • Automatic collision detection and resolution
  • Configurable short code length
  • Comprehensive summary report

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload a JSON or CSV file containing URLs from stash
  • Output Format: Select JSON, CSV, or both
  • Short Code Length: Length of generated short codes (default: 6)
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Input Format

JSON: Array of URLs or object with 'urls' key

CSV: First column contains URLs (with optional header)

Output

The application generates redirect mapping files in your chosen format(s) plus a summary report showing all mappings.

Use Cases

  • Creating URL shortener databases
  • Generating redirect configurations
  • Building link management systems
  • Creating vanity URL mappings
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_${RANDOM}_${RANDOM}"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/url_shortener_data.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}" -f "${outputFormat}" -l ${shortCodeLength}
